title: [Self-directed] Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Course Based on Personalized Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Theory and No Experience with Learning Management Systems (LMS)
context.additional_context: Personalized learning design competency development in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on systematic acquisition and practical application of learner-tailored instructional design methods for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Personalized educational plans for learners can be established using a learning management system (LMS)
Personalized instructional materials for social studies subjects can be developed through project-based learning (PBL)
Educational effectiveness can be evaluated, and improvement strategies can be derived based on learner data analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
